info.name: Darkpixel
info.description: A custom CSS script to darken the Hypixel Website, simple and elegant, to the comfort of your eyes. Found a bug with Darkpixel or have a suggestion? Feel free to join us at Discord and tell us! https://forumpixel.glitch.me/discord IMPORTANT: Enable "Expose iframes" on your Stylus settings for full functionality. MICROSOFT EDGE LEGACY USERS: Install the style as a userscript using the button below (Requires Tampermonkey for Edge)
